verses.roman:
jayādvaita-candra jaya karuṇā-sāgara
jaya gaura-bhakta-gaṇa kṛpā-pūrṇāntara

synonyms: jaya—all glories; advaita-candra—to Advaita Ācārya; jaya—all glories; karuṇā-sāgara—the ocean of mercy; jaya—all glories; gaura-bhakta-gaṇa—to the devotees of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛpā-pūrṇa-antara—whose hearts are always filled with mercy.
translation: All glories to Advaita Ācārya, who is also an ocean of mercy! All glories to all the devotees of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, whose hearts are always filled with mercy!
